data.eml:eml: An overview of the tribe Cnephasiini (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Tortricinae) of Iran with description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alipanah, Helen (2019): An overview of the tribe Cnephasiini (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Tortricinae) of Iran with description of a new species. Zootaxa 4661 (3): 501-521, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4661.3.5
